name: DaddySaturday
0:
”Alexa, daddy saturday”
”Alexa, ask daddy saturday what to do this Saturday?”
”Alexa, ask daddy saturday how many daddy saturdays left with Johnny?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daddy saturday
des:
All of us want to be better dads, we just don’t know how. After interviewing hundreds of dads, the number one challenge is, “ I want to engage my kids, I just don’t know what to do.” The Daddy Saturday Alexa Skill brings epic activities to a dad’s fingertips so he can engage his kids in an intentional way. All a dad needs to do is “Ask Daddy Saturday” and the Skill will look at the weather in your area and recommend an inside or an outside activity, provide the instructions in an the Alexa App and email and place any items needed to complete the activity in your Amazon Shopping List for PRIME shipping. The activities included are fun for kids 2-18 and can be scaled up or down

The average child has just over 900 weeks in the home before they grow up. The time a dad has with his children is his most valuable asset. After inputting some simple details, Ask Daddy Saturday, “How many Daddy Saturdays left with [CHILD'S NICKNAME]?” The Daddy Saturday Alexa Skill will calculate the number of weeks your child has left in the home and create an audible reminder using VOICE to show the limited time a dad has with his kids in the home.

For more information about how to be a better dad, visit DaddySaturday.com
